subject: Pedals issue
description_text:
Good evening,

I received my pedals and when I download the app to calibrate, it kept showing that my brake is at 50% even though i didn't apply ơn the pedal and my throttle is only going to 30% max.

What should I do?

Kevin Tran
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Zayne Jaan Tran,   Please set the Offset feature first to adjust the white signal to the 0% initial position. After that, recalibrate the pedals. Once done, the blue game progress bar will correctly reach 100% when you press the pedal.

I just did that, seems like it sort of fix the problem, but when I press either pedals down for the blue bar to reach 100%, the white line inside the blue bar only go to about 30%, is that a problem?

>
Hi Zayne Jaan Tran,    You need to calibrate the pedals following the instructions in the manual. After calibration, the blue pedal can be pressed smoothly from 0% to 100%.
